thread.title: BRIEF-Park Hotels & Resorts To Buy Additional Shares In Secondary Offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Park Hotels & Resorts To Buy Additional Shares In Secondary Offering
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Park Hotels & Resorts Inc:
* PARK HOTELS & RESORTS INC. ANNOUNCES FULL EXERCISE OF OPTION TO PURCHASE ADDITIONAL SHARES IN SECONDARY OFFERING
* PARK HOTELS & RESORTS INC - UNDERWRITERS EXERCISED IN FULL THEIR OPTION TO BUY 5.2 MILLION ADDITIONAL SHARES AT AN EXERCISE PRICE OF $25.75 PER SHARE
* PARK HOTELS & RESORTS INC - FOLLOWING CLOSING OF OFFERING AND REPURCHASE, HNA WILL NO LONGER BENEFICIALLY OWN ANY SHARES OF PARKâ€™S COMMON STOCK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
